description: Jon has worked in web programming since 1995 and discovered PHP in 2001, when he accidentally got a job at Zend. Writing unix and windows installation scripts. In PHP. Since then He has worked for numerous organizations and companies, including the BBC where he helped to build the 2012 Olympics Site. Jon has worked for the past 4 years at Inviqa where he trains on subjects as diverse as BDD, TDD, Symfony, Object Oriented Principles, Magento, and ES6. He is a strong advocate of Fullstack BDD, and London-School / Mockist TDD.
